Address: 101 N BROADWAY STE 200, OKLAHOMA CITY, Oklahoma, 73102-8401, United States of America
CompanyDescription: BancFirst Corporation (the "Company") is a financial holding company headquartered in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma and registered under the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956, as amended (the "BHC Act"). It conducts a vast majority of its operating activities through its wholly-owned subsidiary, BancFirst ("BancFirst"), an Oklahoma state-chartered bank headquartered in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. The Company also conducts operating activities through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Pegasus Bank ("Pegasus Bank"), a Texas state-chartered bank headquartered in Dallas, Texas.  ... More ...
